languages.text: "Просто пообещай, что больше не будешь так делать".
"All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."
languages.original_text: "Просто пообещай, что больше не будешь так делать".

traits.locale_text: "All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."
"All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."
"All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."
"All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."

languages.text: 「二度とそんな真似はしないと約束しろ。それだけだ」
languages.original_text: "All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."

traits.locale_text: 「二度とそんな真似はしないと約束しろ。それだけだ。」

languages.text: «Lo único que te pido es que me prometas que no volverás a hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."

traits.locale_text: «Lo único que te pido es que me prometas que no volverás a hacerlo».

languages.text: “我只要求你保证不会再做这种事情。”
languages.original_text: "All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."

traits.locale_text: “我只要求你保证不会再做这种事情。”

languages.text: "Ich bitte Euch nur, es nicht wieder zu tun."
languages.original_text: "All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte Euch nur, es nicht wieder zu tun."

languages.text: « Je vous demande simplement de promettre de ne plus le refaire. »
languages.original_text: "All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous demande simplement de promettre de ne plus le refaire. »

languages.text: "Tek istediğim, bir daha yapmayacağına söz vermen."
languages.original_text: "All I ask is that you promise not to do it again."

traits.locale_text: "Tek istediğim, bir daha yapmayacağına söz vermen."
